Articles.Content:
Hi I'm now making RO config for Stockalike Station Parts Redux, and I have a question, it have in It's module crew to deploy (you have to have some enginner to deploy it). Is there a way to add some gas nead for deployment (i mean somethings like ignitors in engines)?

Thank you for any help

Take a look on engines, RCS valves, so you see how it works on config, but you will need some transforms references in you object on Unity so KSP know where it emits it!

 

p.s.: I believe this post should be in General Mod Development Help and Support﻿

Edited April 29, 2020 by Climberfx

SSPX has patches for MKS that require material kits to deploy the modules.  You could change the material kits to nitrogen or air or oxygen or whatever.  Realism might require some research and decisions about mass or volume, but that's a good place to start.
